info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: Wall Gazer
collection.openText: Her unbearable sorrow grew long, mournful hair over time.

specialTipSize.specialTip: If an employee assigned to $0 has level 1 Temperance, there’s a risk of the employee turning around after listening to her. Turning around towards her will cause instant Panic.
As soon as Attachment was performed on $0, the Qliphoth counter dropped.
When the work result was normal, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a normal probability.
When the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a high probability.
When $0's Qliphoth counter reaches zero, all employees in the department will suffer White damage.
